${ModID}:MakeshiftSwordPower.NAME: Makeshift Sword
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当 a card is created during combat, 获得 #b%d #yVigor.

${ModID}:MakeshiftShieldPower.NAME: Makeshift Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当 a card is created during combat, 获得 #b%d #y格挡 。

${ModID}:FirewallPower.NAME: Firewall
DESCRIPTIONS: When a #yStatus card is created, #yExhaust it.
